comments:
Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1. In Eclipse open Help > Help Contents
2. Go to Workbench User Guide > Getting started > Basic tutorial > Exporting files
3. Click on "Export Wizard" link (3rd bullet)
4. Once the Wizard is opened, leave it open, go back and click the link again
5. Check the Error log and you'll see "There was an error executing the command: org.eclipse.ui.file.export"



More information:

org.eclipse.core.commands.ExecutionException: No activeWorkbenchWindow found while executing org.eclipse.ui.file.export

Info:

On linux you cannot click the link again while the dialog is open.

Also, if the dialog is already open there is no active workbench window, and the export command can do nothing (it's acceptable to throw an execution exception if execution event information is missing).

PW
